description: If last year's announcement focused on the technical details centered around the big event of the MSA transition, this time we would like to share with many people the journey of how Soomgo, which was a monolithic service, faced difficulties in the early days of its service and how it transitioned to MSA as the service grew.

related_urls.label: The Journey from Monolithic to MSA

title: The Journey from Monolithic to MSA
